title: Screen freeze
body: When playing always like in the mid game the screen freezes and the only way to unfreeze is turning off the laptop, but i can still talk in skype and hear the game. What can i do?

replies.body: That kind of freezing sounds like the entire League program is locking up for some reason. It could be graphics related, or it might be due to some bad game files. I'd suggest first trying to run a repair through the client, and if that doesn't help check out the steps listed in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide as that has some steps to troubleshoot graphical errors.
i tried it and it is still happening any other solution?

Hmmm there could also be something else going on with your pc other than drivers and such thats disabling that monitor during League. Our tech guys should be able to look over some of your logs to see what's happening, so go ahead and read out to them in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
